name: 2400 Motel
description: Simple 1-4 bedroom motel units with free Wi-Fi & cable TV, plus a lawned garden with picnic area.

featured_reviews.review_id: This place is nothing like the website. I don't know where the people who wrote the good reviews stayed but our rooms were so bad. Carpets so stained with ????  Bed sheets stained with blood. Lock on door says to lock at night for safety but it is painted shut and lock goes around in circles. Bathroom floor all sticky with ?  Bathroom tile and grout not finished or if it was a mouse could come through the grout. Holes in walls. No more rooms available?? For real? Wish I could give it a negative. So bad
featured_reviews.review_text: This place is nothing like the website. I don't know where the people who wrote the good reviews stayed but our rooms were so bad. Carpets so stained with ????  Bed sheets stained with blood. Lock on door says to lock at night for safety but it is painted shut and lock goes around in circles. Bathroom floor all sticky with ?  Bathroom tile and grout not finished or if it was a mouse could come through the grout. Holes in walls. No more rooms available?? For real? Wish I could give it a negative. So bad
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Patricia, 
Thanks for the note. I didn't see your name in our system but I'll try and sleuth which room you were in and ensure it is prioritized for renovation work. We'll be better next time. 
Be well.

featured_reviews.review_id:
It's much cheaper than most other options but that's for a reason, the rooms are very out of date, and not exactly the most clean looking. The hot water didn't work, the bathroom tile looked quite dirty, and there were stains on the carpet.
On the positive side, the bedding was very clean, the outside of the units are very cute, convenient to get a bus down to English bay and Stanley park, some good food options close by, and all the staff were very nice.
featured_reviews.review_text:
It's much cheaper than most other options but that's for a reason, the rooms are very out of date, and not exactly the most clean looking. The hot water didn't work, the bathroom tile looked quite dirty, and there were stains on the carpet.
On the positive side, the bedding was very clean, the outside of the units are very cute, convenient to get a bus down to English bay and Stanley park, some good food options close by, and all the staff were very nice.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Danielle, Thanks for giving us a go! I think your note is perfectly fair and appreciate you sharing. We are working on continuing to renovate our guest rooms to match all the exterior work you saw as well! Next time we'll have you in a renovated room :)

featured_reviews.review_id: My grandparents stayed here about 3 years ago during peak COVID when they came back for quarantine. I know I'm late on this review but my grandparents loved the place. The rooms were spacious, clean, and friendly, It also includes a kitchen so that's a bonus. Excellent place
featured_reviews.review_text: My grandparents stayed here about 3 years ago during peak COVID when they came back for quarantine. I know I'm late on this review but my grandparents loved the place. The rooms were spacious, clean, and friendly, It also includes a kitchen so that's a bonus. Excellent place
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Never too late for good news. I am glad we were able to be there for them at a tough time!  Thanks for sharing.

featured_reviews.review_id: This place is nothing like they show in the pictures. The bathroom is very tiny and whoever did the tiles, looks like he was drunk. Besides, there is not a microwave, refrigerator, or a coffeemaker. The carpet is stained, it has some old cheap furniture. the grass is all unkempt and there are cigarette butts lying everywhere. The I think that the owner should renovate this dump for pride
featured_reviews.review_text: This place is nothing like they show in the pictures. The bathroom is very tiny and whoever did the tiles, looks like he was drunk. Besides, there is not a microwave, refrigerator, or a coffeemaker. The carpet is stained, it has some old cheap furniture. the grass is all unkempt and there are cigarette butts lying everywhere. The I think that the owner should renovate this dump for pride
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Ebelyn,
Well, we agree bathrooms in the room type you booked are deserving their place as the next reno! Some of those start next week :)  
If kitchen facilities are important to you, we have options with Kitchenettes or even full kitchens that might suit better next time. 
Thanks for your feedback.

featured_reviews.review_id: I recently stayed at 2400 Motel in Vancouver, and it was a great experience. The staff was friendly, the room was clean and comfortable, and the location was convenient. I highly recommend it!
featured_reviews.review_text: I recently stayed at 2400 Motel in Vancouver, and it was a great experience. The staff was friendly, the room was clean and comfortable, and the location was convenient. I highly recommend it!

featured_reviews.review_id:
Disclaimer :
I have personally not stayed at this location, however recently my friends who were visiting from Ontario, booked this place and this is based on their feedback.

Awesome location, friendly staff, open setting for rooms, all on the ground level.
Rooms were clean and service staff was very helpful.

The major drawback is that each room does not necessarily have a small microwave, or fridge. So if you have kids, you need to choose the kitchenette option when booking.

Less than 15ins walk from the Nanaimo and 29th Avenue skytrain stations which is a blessing, transit bus service also available as it falls on the Major Kingsway road.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hi Jayant,
Thanks for relaying the feedback! I am glad they had a great stay and enjoyed our many positives!

featured_reviews.review_id: Mold in rooms, rats running around.  All around dirty. The window on my door broke because the door swings shut by itself and as it did smashed into my elbow cutting it. Instead of being concerned about their guests and fixing it right away, they put some really thin 1/8 inch  thick wood across in place of window. It stayed like that for the duration of my stay about 1 month, on top of that charged me 200 for a small thin piece of single pain glass and didn't even bother to fix it. Abdoloutly horrific place to stay. My laundry was taken out of the dryer and given to another room by the front desk lady. The cleaning ladies are very polite and courteous but thats about all I have to say good about this dive! Oh and it is far too expensive for whst you get there. Better off with an air b&b or a tent

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anthony, Thanks for the note. That's disappointing on the room cleanliness - I've shared with housekeeping and will investigate!

featured_reviews.review_id: One of the most filth rooms I've ever stayed in. Reeked of cigarettes. The mattress also had a bit of a funky smell to it
featured_reviews.review_text: One of the most filth rooms I've ever stayed in. Reeked of cigarettes. The mattress also had a bit of a funky smell to it
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for letting me know. Can you tell me which room? Funky smells and mattresses are both things we've ugpraded so I want to see where we missed.
